column1: Benchmark sensitivity (average 90% CL limit in the absence of DM signal) for 10-kg-yr and 1-ton-yr exposures with future SBC detectors. Limits assume sensitivity to 100-eV argon recoils, and are based on Feldman-Cousins sensitivity given a known neutrino CEvNS background.

column3: SBC ton-scale Benchmark SI Sensitivity (10-year horizon) [cm^2]
